parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: ID of the run from which to fetch metric values. Must be provided.

parameters.name: run_uuid
parameters.description: [Deprecated, use run_id instead] ID of the run from which to fetch metric values. This field will be removed in a future MLflow version.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Token indicating the page of metric histories to fetch.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

429.description: Operation is rejected due to throttling, e.g. some resource has been exhausted, per-user quota.

get.description: Gets a list of all values for the specified metric for a given run.
